name: 180 Seconds (The Nutella Files)
description:
You are a skeleton who is reanimated for only 180 seconds. Legend has it that if a reanimated individual should go through the crypt door, they will live once more.

Jump and dash around the crypt in this 1-bit platformer. Collect optional SOUL COINS, and try for a total of 5 different endings!

Controls:

W, S: Jump / Climb Up, Climb Down

A,D: Left and Right

[Controller Support Included]

Left Joystick: Left/Right, Climb Up/Down

A Button: Jump

This game is a small project, so any feedback I get will help a lot!
